incompatiblePomodoroSet: Your custom pomodoro set cannot be converted to a basic task count. Click "Reset" to use the default task count. Otherwise, click "Cancel" to continue using your custom pomodoro set.
incompatibleTime: Your current time is either higher than the simple view's maximum value or cannot be converted evenly from seconds into minutes. Click "Reset" to use to the default time. Otherwise, click "Cancel" to continue using your current time.
pendingChangesBanner: Your pending changes have not been saved yet.
settings.alwaysOnTop.description: Force the window to always remain on top of other windows.
settings.alwaysOnTop.label: Always on top
settings.autoStartBreaks.description: Automatically selects the "Continue after break" option when the task timer ends.
settings.autoStartBreaks.label: Auto start breaks
settings.autoStartTasks.description: Automatically start the task timer if a task is selected.
settings.autoStartTasks.label: Auto start tasks
settings.checkPomelloStatus.description: Show a dialog if not logged in to a Pomello account.
settings.checkPomelloStatus.label: Check Pomello account login status
settings.completedTaskPosition.descripti: Determines where in the list a moved task should appear.
settings.completedTaskPosition.label: Moved task list position
settings.createdTaskPosition.description: Determines where in the list a created task should appear.
settings.createdTaskPosition.label: Created task list position
settings.longBreakTime.description: The length of the long break timer.
settings.longBreakTime.label: Long break time
settings.overtime.description: Display a counter when an extended period of inaction is detected after a timer has ended.
settings.overtime.label: Overtime
settings.overtimeDelay.description: The amount of time to wait before display the overtime counter.
settings.overtimeDelay.label: Overtime delay
settings.pomodoroSet.description: Customize the timers in the pomodoro set.
settings.pomodoroSet.label: Pomodoro set
settings.resetPomodoroSet.description: Resets the pomodoro set after an extended period of inactivity.
settings.resetPomodoroSet.label: Reset pomodoro set
settings.shortBreakTime.description: The length of the short break timer.
settings.shortBreakTime.label: Short break time
settings.snapEdges.description: Automatically align to the closest edge(s) when moving the window near the edges of the screen,
settings.snapEdges.label: Snap to screen edge
settings.taskTime.description: The length of the task timer.
settings.taskTime.label: Task time
settings.timeExpiredNotification.descrip: Choose how Pomello notifies you when the timer ends.
settings.timeExpiredNotification.label: Time expired notification
settings.titleFormat.description: Set the format used for displaying the Pomodoro count.
settings.titleFormat.label: Card title marker format
settings.titleMarker.description: Set the icon used for displaying the Pomodoro count.
settings.titleMarker.label: Card title Pomodoro marker
settings.warnBeforeAppQuit.description: Show a confirmation dialog before quitting Pomello.
settings.warnBeforeAppQuit.label: Warn before quitting app
settings.warnBeforeTaskCancel.descriptio: Show a confirmation dialog before canceling an active task.
settings.warnBeforeTaskCancel.label: Warn before canceling task
settingsSyncDisabled: Syncing is disabled. <logIn>Log in</logIn> to Pomello to sync your settings.
trackProductivityMessage: <logIn>Log in</logIn> or <signUp>sign up</signUp> to track your productivity.
